name: CluedoRL
description:
For quite some time I have been wanting to join the 7DRL and see how it all went (I'm not in the game business nor play too many myself). This is my first attempt at a Roguelike and definitely my first "completed" game albeit it isn't actually what I would call complete.

During the pandemic the family has been playing a lot of Clue the board game and mobile app. Since that is fresh in the mind figured why not take a stab at a derivative.  Not sure how much actual fun came from this version, but it was made within the time constraints of life and the contest so I am content!

Controls

  • [W] or [Up]  Move north
  • [A] or [Left]  Move west
  • [S] or [Down]  Move south
  • [D] or [Right]  Move east
  • [X]  Make an accusation
  • [Tab]  View detective notes
  • [Q] or [Escape]  Quit game or current menu
